Community
=========

Welcome to the STELLA Community! We're glad you're interested in contributing to our open-source project. There are several ways to get involved, from discussing new features to reporting issues. Here's how you can join the conversation and contribute to the project.

Discussion
----------

Have a question, idea, or looking to collaborate with others? Join our discussion page:

`STELLA Discussions <https://github.com/Norditech-AB/STELLA/discussions>`_

This is the perfect place to:

- Ask questions and seek guidance from the community
- Propose new ideas or enhancements
- Share your experiences and tips with others
- Participate in ongoing conversations

Before starting a new discussion, please check if a similar topic already exists. This will help us keep the discussions organized and helpful for everyone.

Report Issues
-------------

Encountered a bug? We want to hear about it so we can improve STELLA for everyone. Report it here:

`STELLA Issue Tracker <https://github.com/Norditech-AB/STELLA/issues>`_

When reporting an issue, please provide:

- A clear and descriptive title
- A detailed description of the problem
- Steps to reproduce the issue
- Any relevant code snippets or error messages

Your reports are valuable to us, and we appreciate your time in making STELLA a better project.

Thank you for being part of our community!
